name: 9mm Round
description: The basic ammunition used by the Pistols . Unlike arrows, javelins, and bolts this ammunition is destroyed on impact and cannot be recovered. With the talent Pistol Proficiency , Prospectors can craft this ammo at a -25% reduced resource cost. Also, with the talent Freebies , Prospectors have a 5% chance to craft double ammo. The ability to craft double ammo works in tandem, on a successful proc chance, with the reduced resource cost recipe netting a total of six extra rounds of ammunition.
